column4: Guys, i can sudo, but what is the command in the terminal as sudo, to make myself admin ????
same
what ya mean ?
sudo is what you need in the terminal as well
How to make my user account admin/root/sudo now ?
you have ccsm installed? and the correct 3d drivers for your card? what card?
what exact card please
is there a number with that? ;] like 8800 or something
lspci in the terminal please
nay! just tell me the last bit with the card number ;]
haha dont paste it here--just tell me the very last bit (only the number like 7300 or something)
how old is that card? do you have the restricted drivers new or legacy for it?
open up synaptic and search for nvidia--what driver does it say you have
the gui synaptic
nothing with nvidia? do you have the restricted repos enabled?
nothing with nvidia or nvidea ? (first spelling correct)
which are marked? I have to step away for a few minutes, can continue later
dinner time ;]
your problem can be solved; if I am not here for the next little while certainly many other fine folks can help ;]
and of course I will help when I get back ;]
go ahead--and I will then go eat dinner ;]
